title: Lynda - PayPal Essential Training [update Jan 25, 2016]

Subjects: Business Web 
Software: PayPal 
Author: Christopher Matthew Spencer 
 
Learn how to send and receive online payments securely with PayPal. Author Christopher Matthew Spencer kicks off the course with business and personal account setup, explains buyer and seller protections, and recommends how to identify and avoid spoofs and scams.â€¨â€¨The course then covers making payments, sending invoices, setting up payment buttons, running reports, and refunding payments with PayPal. It also shows how to use the PayPal Mobile app as well as the PayPal Here credit card reader for face-to-face purchases and as a point-of-sale system for retailers. Lastly, Christopher Matthew explores PayPal shipping as well as tips for avoiding transaction disputes and accepting donations for nonprofits.
Topics include:

	â€¢	Sending payments

	â€¢	Avoiding transaction disputes
